com.codename1.rad.attributes

Class Columns

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.models.Attribute<Integer>
      • com.codename1.rad.attributes.Columns

  • public class Columns
extends Attribute<Integer>

    An attribute to specify the number of columns in a form or a form section. Can be passed as an attribute to FormNode or SectionNode.

    See Also:
    UI.columns(int)
